chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product Galaxy S21 Ultra 5G has the above problem:
Charging port defective, plug comes out at slightest movement.

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

You received this device for a repair on 06.06.2024.

We remind you that the processing time for those cases is 3 working days.

We confirm that the address at which you should send back the device to the customer is the following:

Address: Jaspersweg 8
City: Bielefeld
Code: 33659
Country: Deutschland

Please provide the tracking link in this interface when the device has been shipped back to the customer. 

I will come back to this SAV on 14.06.2024. 

If you are unable to handle this device because of a warranty exclusion or a user account still activated, please let us know so that we can assist you. 

As a reminder, failure to do so will lead to a refund of the customer in accordance with our Quality charter.

Regards,
Libania from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare, 

Thank you. We are still processing the device. Will update you soon once we finish checking the device. Thank you.

Regards, 
KW
